description:
Chifusa and Kaede, needing funds, encounter a landlady/Manyu assassin who tries to enslave them. Chifusa uses her Breast Flow technique to defeat her, gaining insights into this power and vowing to restore Kaede`s breasts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Assassins! The Path of Boobalicious Dreams!
刺客! 乳夢道[ちちむどう]
